author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Melrose Industries Says Looks To Compulsorily Acquire Remaining GKN Shares
text:
April 27 (Reuters) - Melrose Industries Plc:
* COMPULSORY ACQUISITION OF REMAINING GKN SHARES * NOW ACQUIRED, UNCONDITIONALLY CONTRACTED TO ACQUIRE OR RECEIVED VALID ACCEPTANCES OF OFFER IN RESPECT OF MORE THAN 90 PERCENT OF VALUE OF GKN
* EXPECTS THAT SUCH OUTSTANDING GKN SHARES WILL BE COMPULSORILY ACQUIRED BY MELROSE
* AS AT 3.00 P.M. ON 26 APRIL 2018, MELROSE RECEIVED ACCEPTANCES OF OFFER IN RESPECT OF 1,561,321,133 GKN SHARES, REPRESENTING ABOUT 90.53 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
